title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not being displayed.
OB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, and then the user tries to create a new table group, nothing happens. The group dialog does not appear.
EB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, and then the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Add a table report item 
2. Do not set the dataset for the table 
3. Try to create a new table group and observe that the group dialog does not appear.
